body: Hey guys, haven't done one of these before on Avicus so yeah, ask any questions you got and I will try respond to them asap.
body_tagged: Hey guys, haven't done one of these before on Avicus so yeah, ask any questions you got and I will try respond to them asap.
title: MarcuzFire AMA Post.

replies.body: How did you choose your name?
replies.body_tagged: How did you choose your name?

replies.body: Good question! I chose my name based of my Club Penguin account (miss that game.. Cri). But my name was MarcuzPenguin. The reason I chose fire because I love the element fire and I chose to merge the two together.
replies.body_tagged: Good question! I chose my name based of my Club Penguin account (miss that game.. Cri). But my name was MarcuzPenguin. The reason I chose fire because I love the element fire and I chose to merge the two together.
